content: उद्भेदः, --दनं {@--1@} Breaking through or out, becoming visible, appearance, display, manifestation, growth, development; किसलयोद्भेदप्रतिद्वंद्विभिः <ls>Ś. 4. 4</ls>; उमास्तनोद्भेदमनु प्रवृद्धः <ls>Ku. 7. 24</ls>; तं यौवनोद्भेदविशेषकांतं <ls>R. 5. 38</ls>; <ls>Śi. 18. 36</ls>; <ls>Mu. 5. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Breaking, splitting; प्रस्तरोद्भदयोग्यः <ls>U. 3. 25.</ls> {@--3@} A spring, fountain. {@--4@} Horripilation; as in पुलकोद्भेद, रोमोद्भेद. {@--5@} Treason, betrayal.
